channel.title: The All In One[Your Server Needs in One Package]V.1
channel.description:
[size=36pt][u][b]THE ALL IN ONE[/b][/u][/size]
[size=14pt]Hello everyone In this Package you will see many things that can help you in your Coding.
There Are:
317 Id List(s) -Animation ids -Coordinates -emotes -graphics -interface -items -memotes -npcs -objects -sound -squest
508 Id List(s)
-508 color -508 emotes -508 graphics -508 interface -508 items -508 npc -508 object -508 sound
525, 603 Id List(s)
-525 npc -603 item -603 npc -603 object
Communication Applications -Hyper Cam Setup -SwitftKit With Zybez -TeamViewer_Setup -Ventrillo Linux -Ventrillo Mac -Ventrillo Windows -Windows Live Messenger
Configurational List(s)
-Actionbuttonids -gfxids -global objectlist -interface config -npc animation -npcdialog coding -npclist -stats -texture list
Other Stuff
-Character Editor -Model Grabber -SilabSoft Desktop Client -Sprite-maker -Java Development Kit -RuneScape Website -WinRaR Installation
Precoded
-317 and Other -acients -coordinates -kalphite -mining -npc dialog animations - npc emotes
-508-525 -banking -offerx -shoping
Runescape Cursors
Server Tool(s)
-Auto-Restarters -AitoSpawn.CFG -Other Gadgets -The Generators -WinterLove Server [Basic] -Runescape Webclient Maker
This was all put togeather by Salayer
Not all of the Things in here were created by me but most was
Download Links: Mediafire: http://www.mediafire.com/?lwray8rqg7cg4dw
Uppit: http://uppit.com/dkipejkvnfww/The_All_In_One.rar
Uppit Short Link: http://up.ht/KNpsBr
If you wish to see more let me know all these were was a bunch of stuff i had so i through them together love to make a V2 but that's your decision.
80% Salayer 20% Other(s)
[/size]

item.title: The All In One[Your Server Needs in One Package]V.1
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

[quote=“zoomer, post:5, topic:443396”][quote author=austin cadle link=topic=546082.msg4003244#msg4003244 date=1338316259]

If u can get me ALL 711 items, Objects, Npcs, Xteas … etc I will be happy

But that’s just spoonfeeding
[/quote]

I don’t see “Spoonfeeding” in the rules :[/quote]

3. We are not a Spoonfeeding community. We do not teach in an oversimplified manner to discourage independent thought. We encourage independent thought, meaning you must help yourselves before requesting help. Failure to provide some sort of prior knowledge or work to the problem will result in a lock of the topic. This is final.
Surly you can infer that this isn't a spoonfeeding community from that, despite the fact that it's a sectional rule.

OT:
Communication Applications
-Hyper Cam Setup
-SwitftKit With Zybez
-TeamViewer_Setup
-Ventrillo Linux
-Ventrillo Mac
-Ventrillo Windows
-Windows Live Messenger
Why would we need half this shit? Any live messenger would do for communicating with your team, and teamviewer for when someone needs assistance. Otherwise the rest is pointless, you can get them all from google anyway.

Read full topic
item.source: The All In One[Your Server Needs in One Package]V.1
